name: Leigh Viner
bio: 🎨 Abstract expressive flowers and other subjects I love to unravel, sometimes I write and take 📸 Featured in Bazaar, Elle, NYmag 📍Denver

hovering over a page” - Acrylic and pastel on paper. 9x12” * 3 - Ordesa 📖

* 5 - Joan Mitchell on her property in Vétheuil France 
* 6 - Taylor Swift 🎵 “All to Well”
* 10 - Janice Biala

Unrequited” 
Inspired by a rose study by Renoir/ oil and charcoal on paper 

 *2 - Studio
* 4 - Joan Mitchell 
* 5 - ☺️ a new bud from a dead long stem rose 🥀 that I continued to nourish. 
* 6 - The Church 🎵 “Flickering Lights” …. “Walk on through the roses and bricks” ( Prompt inspiration ) 
* 7 -Lucia Cristiani 
* 8 - iPad sketches
* 9 - @thoughtcatalog and @jacquelinewhitney_
* 10 - Artist Unknown

Lucency -

Happy Friday everyone! 💐

#botanical #flowers #painting #abstract #expressionism #mixedmedia #oilpaint #pastel #watercolor #leighviner #artist #roses #abstractart

Blue Moon 

#portrait #art #painting #watercolor #pencil #pastel #leighviner #beauty

Still Life with Blue Iris and Daffodils ~ ( Prints coming Friday ) & original also available. Mixed media, gouache and pastel on A4 paper

“It is better to paint a good unfinished picture than a poor completed one. 
Many believe that a picture is finished when they have worked in as many details as possible. 
—One stroke can be a completed work of art. “ -Edvard Munch ‘The Private Journals’ 

#stilllife #floral #daffodils #Iris #flowers #artonpaper #art #painting #botanicalart #abstract #bouquet #leighviner #artist

A busy table  going on in today’s still life. Poisson, red onion, two bouquets of mixed flowers and a painting I call Edith. 

#stilllife #floral #flowers #artonpaper #art #painting #botanicalart #abstract #bouquet #leighviner #artist
Working on a collection of line gesture and figure drawings in ink, also charcoal and digital in the studio between the flowers and other subjects, so many things I want to create at once 🙃 🎨

“Daffodil”
May 2023 mixed media on paper

"I have many things to tell you still, but it is getting late and one needs to get up early tomorrow to finish a bouquet that has already withered. My life is among flowers." 
 ~ Henri Fantin-Latour

{ Inspired by - Narcisses Simples et Doubles dans un Verre Long 1871 - Henri Fantin-Latour } 

#floralart #daffodils #painting #art #mixedmedia #leighviner #artonpaper #artist #flowers #spring #illustration #study

Arrived just in time for my Birthday🙌🏻💛Snagged this limited edition artist pot by @jamiebeck and williamruller I will cherish and use daily for my brushes and flowers 🌸 Thank you both for this beauty and perfect addition to my studio 🎨 🤍🤍
2nd photo via @jamiebeck.co

“Waking up” -  1/1/24 
Watercolor, gouache, oil, pastel on paper

“Daylight leaks in, and sluggishly I surface
from my own dreams into the common dream
and things assume again their proper places
and there accustomed shapes. Into this present
the Past intrudes, in all its dizzying range—..”
- Jorge Luis Borges 

#art #painting #artonpaper #leighviner #artist #studio #BotanicalStudies #flowerart #botanicalart #roses
Last Chance! 🥹 www.leighviner.com all artwork leaving the shop tomorrow 1/4/24

In the light -  1/10/24 
watercolor, gouache, oil, graphite, colored pencil on paper 

“ in the twilight
as the last light filters
through the woods...”
- Jim Harrison 

#art #painting #artonpaper #leighviner #artist #studio #BotanicalStudies #flowerart #botanicalart

Bloom - My Red Door - 1/11/24
Acrylic, pastel, charcoal on paper 12 x16 in. ( 30 x 41 cm ) 

“.. I stumble sleepily through eternities fixed hardness
and love at the end without dawn. Love. Visible love!” .. 
- Federico Garcia Lorca

*2nd photo - Josef Albers 
Related I (red), 1943
